DOC.brief_summary: Measure blood progesterone by using cervical device contraception.
DOC.detailed_description: A very small cervical device that releases small amount of progesterone 20 mcgm/day. The target of the research is to measure blood progesterone by using the cervical device. This small device delivers progesterone by nanotechnology method.
DOC.criteria: 10 healthy women are candidate for hysterectomy Women with neoplastic malignancy disease or thrombophylia
DOC.keyword: Blood progesterone measure in using the device
